CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV and MOT and CHI enter the room . CHI is apparently unhappy and is crying but calms down . INV explains warm- up to MOT and leaves the room
MOT is sitting on chair next to dresser with CHI on her lap . CHI is drinking from her bottle
MOT points to something in front of her and looks in the direction she is pointing
MOT looks up and points in the same direction as before
<4> MOT turns head to the left
MOT points and looks at drawings on wall
CHI looks up in direction MOT points
MOT stops pointing . <aft> MOT looks down at CHI
MOT turns head to her right
MOT reaches out for a kleenex on the dresser
CHI looks at kleenex in MOT's hands
MOT puts kleenex to CHI's nose
CHI turns head around so it touches MOT's front
MOT continues to wipe CHI's nose
CHI moves head to the left to get away from kleenex
CHI takes kleenex and puts it up to her mouth
MOT turns head to her left and looks at the drawings on the wall
MOT moves around a little on the chair
MOT looks at item on wall
MOT lifts CHI's leg up to rearrange CHI's position
MOT points to item on wall
CHI looks at item on wall
CHI moves head a little bit to the right while holding kleenex under her nose
<aft> MOT kisses CHI on CHI's head
MOT points to item on floor
MOT points to item on floor . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
CHI starts sliding down from MOT's lap
MOT helps CHI down on the floor
CHI is sitting on the floor next to chair holding onto her bottle
MOT holds hand out towards CHI
CHI looks up at MOT's hand
MOT takes kleenex . <aft> MOT puts both hands in her lap
CHI puts bottle down on floor
MOT crosses legs and puts her hand under her chin
CHI continues to crawl towards book
MOT rights bottle on floor and puts it next to chair
<bef> CHI reaches the book . CHI turns around facing MOT . <aft> CHI raises her arms
MOT picks up bottle and gives it to CHI
<bef> CHI follows bottle with her eyes . <aft> CHI turns head to the left and looks at toys on floor
<$=3> MOT remains seated in chair and is mostly out of camera view
CHI crawls towards the truck still holding onto bottle . <aft> CHI turns around
CHI begins to reach for an object then turns around to look at MOT
CHI turns around again and reaches out for jack+in+the+box
CHI pulls jack+in+the+box closer to her holding onto crank
<bef> CHI lets go of crank . CHI plays with crank with her other hand
CHI continues to play with crank
<aft> CHI lifts jack+in+the+box up in the air holding onto crank
<aft> CHI puts jack+in+the+box down on floor in front of her and uses both hands to push it over so the top is up
CHI looks down then reaches for truck next to jack+in+the+box
CHI turns around so she is facing MOT . <aft> CHI looks up at MOT
CHI puts truck on the floor
CHI stretches arm out pushing truck on the floor pretending it is driving
CHI torso is almost touching floor
CHI continues to push truck on floor
it sounds as if MOT yawns
truck slips away from CHI who falls forwards
CHI looks at truck . <aft> CHI looks at jack+in+the+box
CHI turns head to her left and looks at book
CHI turns her head to right then to the left and looks at book
CHI pays no attention to MOT
CHI looks around on the floor with her back to MOT
CHI turns head and looks over at chair where MOT is sitting then she turns head and looks at football
CHI moves backwards to get closer to the book
<bef> CHI lifts book up with one hand . CHI drops book
CHI pushes book down on floor . <aft> CHI turns torso around
<aft> CHI looks at jack+in+the+box then at another toy
CHI bends over a little and starts playing with crank on jack+in+the+box
after a little while CHI turns crank a little bit and jack+in+the+box makes music
CHI pulls jack+in+the+box closer holding onto crank
CHI tries to open top with one hand then puts hand on crank
<aft> CHI looks up at another toy and then at the plugs
CHI tries to turn crank and then bends over and picks up jack+in+the+box with both hands
<bef> CHI uses legs to turn around so she is facing MOT
MOT bends over . <aft> MOT throws kleenex in the wastebasket and reaches out for jack+in+the+box
MOT turns crank which makes music
MOT looks at jack+in+the+box then at CHI and then back at jack+in+the+box
<bef> CHI looks down at the floor then up when jack+in+the+box pops up
MOT stops turning crank and gives jack+in+the+box to CHI
MOT sits back and puts hand under chin
<aft> MOT rolls up the sleeves on both arms
CHI bends over and touches white cross taped on floor
CHI looks at white cross on floor
<$=3> MOT points to duck on floor
CHI turns head and looks at duck
<$=1> MOT continues to point at duck
CHI turns around and reaches out for duck
CHI looks at duck in her hand
CHI is now sitting down with her back to the camera holding the toy duck
CHI holds duck in one hand and holds it out towards MOT
<aft> CHI stretches arm further out as if to touch MOT's boot with duck
CHI lets duck fall to the floor . <aft> CHI reaches out for MOT's boot with other hand
CHI touches boot a little longer and then pulls hand away
CHI bangs hand on top on jack+in+the+box and then starts playing with clown
CHI pushes jack+in+the+box over still holding onto it with one hand
<bef> MOT leans over towards CHI in chair
MOT gets her bag . <aft> MOT hangs bag over arm rest
CHI turns head and looks at book . <aft> CHI turns head to her right and looks at football
CHI starts to crawl towards football
CHI picks up football . <aft> CHI sits down
CHI plays with football in her hand
<bef> CHI bends over . CHI stretches both legs out and spreads them apart
CHI looks up at MOT then holds the football up in the direction of MOT
CHI holds football out towards MOT
CHI follows football with her eyes
CHI turns head and follows ball with her eyes
football rolls behind CHI and stops next to the wastebasket
CHI turns head around to the other side
CHI turns all the way around and crawls towards football
<aft> CHI picks up football then turns torso around a little
football rolls past MOT and out of the view of the camera
CHI crawls under the desk where the football went
MOT leans forwards on chair to see what is going on
CHI crawls backwards out from under the desk with football in her arm
<bef> CHI turns around and sits on the floor . <aft> CHI looks up at MOT
CHI holds football up in the air with one arm
MOT stretches hand out towards CHI
CHI puts football in MOT's hand
CHI touches handle on one of the drawers in desk
football rolls towards wall where wastebasket is
CHI picks up football and turns around
CHI is sitting down on floor next to jack+in+the+box facing camera
<bef> CHI looks at jack+in+the+box . CHI follows football with her eyes
CHI grabs onto chair with one hand
<aft> CHI turns head around and looks at door
INV explains about Small Scale Activity to MOT and puts toys out on table . INV leaves
CHI who was drinking her bottle starts crying when she sees INV but calms down when MOT picks her up
INV puts away all the toys on the table except one and has MOT sit on a chair in front of it with CHI in her lap
CHI starts to cry but quiets down when she gets her bottle
INV explains about the Forbidden Object activity to MOT
MOT is sitting on chair at table with CHI who is drinking her bottle in her lap . INV is sitting across from them holding the forbidden object
MOT inclines her head a little bit to get a better look at CHI
<aft> INV reaches down and closes the drawer of the desk
CHI turns her head and looks down as INV closes the drawer . <aft> CHI looks at forbidden object again
MOT looks at CHI then kisses CHI on the cheek
CHI turns her head and looks at forbidden object
MOT looks from CHI to INV to CHI
CHI is still drinking her bottle
CHI is still looking at forbidden object and reaches hand out towards it
MOT turns head and looks at forbidden object
MOT turns head and looks at CHI
MOT looks at forbidden object . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
CHI pulls hand back and puts it around bottle
CHI reaches hand out towards forbidden object
CHI pulls hand back and puts it around bottle
CHI looks at MOT then at forbidden object
MOT turns head . <aft> MOT blows on forbidden object
MOT looks at forbidden object . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
INV folds forbidden object together and puts it away
INV explains four PCI boxes to MOT then goes to get the boxes in another room . INV puts boxes in room and leaves
MOT is sitting in chair at table with CHI in her lap . CHI is drinking her bottle
MOT puts her hands under CHI's armpits
MOT gets up holding CHI in one arm . <aft> MOT puts chair in front of the wall
MOT places CHI on the floor in front of the small chair
CHI's left side is facing camera
<aft> MOT walks towards desk with PCI boxes
CHI is still drinking her bottle
<bef> MOT takes something from desk . MOT turns around
MOT sits down in front of CHI and puts box with ball next to her
CHI takes bottle out of her mouth and puts it down on floor then starts to crawl towards box
MOT hold box up in one end
CHI looks at ball in box then reaches for it
MOT lets go of box with one hand and picks up bottle with the other
CHI holds onto box with one hand and reaches into box with the other to get ball out
CHI looks up at MOT . <aft> CHI looks at box
MOT puts one hand on box
CHI tries to get ball out with both hands
CHI takes ball out of box with both hands and puts it on floor next to MOT still holding onto it
<bef> MOT moves box out of the way . MOT holds both hands out towards CHI with palms up
ball touches MOT's fingers on one hand and slides down the side of her leg
MOT catches ball before it rolls away
CHI looks a little bit to her left . <aft> CHI looks at MOT's hands
MOT pulls her hands holding ball back
CHI stretches arms out and leans torso forwards
ball hits CHI's head and bounces back to MOT
CHI raises arms and touches ball with hands
<bef> MOT leans arms on legs holding them out towards CHI
CHI raises arms and tries to catch ball
ball touches CHI's hands and falls to floor
MOT bends over and moves CHI a little further back
MOT bounces ball in her hands
CHI raises arms to catch ball
ball hits CHI's chest and lands in front of MOT's knees
CHI reaches out for ball then reaches hand out towards cross on floor
CHI loses interest in ball when she notices cross on floor
MOT stops ball with hand and rolls it to CHI
MOT places ball on CHI's leg
CHI pulls hand away from cross

g.ga: try to take tape off floor

u.a: balls falls off and rolls away
MOT touches ball with one finger
ball touches MOT's knees and rolls away
MOT picks up ball and squeezes it in front of CHI
CHI pulls hand away from cross
MOT puts ball on floor next to her knees still holding onto it
CHI bends over puts both hands around ball
MOT holds hands out towards ball
<aft> CHI moves ball up and down for a few times and then throws ball to MOT
ball hits floor right in front of MOT
<bef> MOT looks at ball . MOT looks at CHI
MOT holds ball up in front of her . <aft> MOT puts ball on floor next to her
CHI turns head and looks at ball
MOT reaches hands out towards ball
CHI looks at MOT . <aft> CHI turns around towards chair
MOT puts hands in her lap
<bef> CHI picks up ball . CHI turns around
MOT holds hands out with palms up
CHI stretches arms out towards MOT
<aft> CHI puts ball on floor in front of MOT
CHI follows ball with her eyes
MOT rolls ball so it is next to her knees
MOT follows ball with her eyes
CHI watches ball then looks a little to her left
MOT points to and looks at something at her left side
MOT puts one hand on ball
MOT rolls ball towards its box next to her
MOT puts ball in its box
CHI gets down on hands and knees
MOT reaches out for another box
MOT takes box down from table and puts in front of her
CHI sits in front of MOT watching her
CHI leans forward reaching for contents of box
CHI takes towel out of box
MOT moves box out of the way
CHI looks at towel then at MOT
MOT reaches for towel then looks at towel
MOT unfolds towel in front of her
MOT holds towel up in front of CHI
CHI pushes towel down with her hands . <aft> CHI moves her arm up and down
CHI looks off to the side then up towards MOT
MOT holds towel up in front of her face but drops one side of it
MOT picks up the side she dropped and holds towel up in front of her face
MOT holds towel up in front of CHI so it covers all of CHI
CHI pushes towel with her head
CHI turns her body to one side
CHI straightens up and starts playing with towel
CHI holds towel up in front of her so rim of towel is just below her face
CHI lifts up towel so it covers all of her
CHI puts towel in her lap
CHI turns upper body to one side
MOT turns her head in the direction of the PCI boxes
CHI starts crawling under the table
<bef> MOT glances at CHI . MOT looks at towel
CHI kneels in front of the table facing the camera
CHI stands up holding onto table for support
MOT puts towel over her head
CHI walks sideways to the right still holding onto the table
CHI stretches arm out trying to reach box with ball on the table
MOT moves box closer to CHI and tilts the box on its side
MOT helps CHI get box down on the floor
CHI sits down holding onto table
MOT puts towel in its box then closes box and puts box on desk
CHI moves closer to box and tries to get ball out of it
CHI takes ball out of box
MOT moves box out of the way
CHI holds ball up in front of her
MOT claps her hands twice then holds them out towards CHI with palms up
CHI looks off to one side then follows ball with her eyes
<aft> MOT catches ball with one hand then throws it up in her lap and catches it there
CHI raises her arms up over her head
MOT lets go of the ball in her lap
CHI takes hands down and puts them on ball
<bef> MOT holds arms out towards CHI
ball hits MOT's knee and rolls away
MOT puts ball over cross taped on floor
<bef> CHI gets on hands and knees and leans towards cross on floor . CHI touches cross on floor
CHI looks at cross on floor
CHI pushes ball out of the way
CHI pays no attention to MOT nor ball and continues to play with cross
MOT picks up ball and puts it back in its box
<bef> MOT takes down another box and puts it on her lap
<bef> MOT puts lid under box . MOT picks up a crayon and holds it up in front of CHI
<bef> MOT looks at CHI . MOT looks down in box
CHI reaches out for crayon and takes it . CHI looks at crayon
MOT takes a piece of paper out of the box and puts it on the floor next to the child . <aft> MOT pats paper three times
MOT looks at paper then back in box
CHI looks at paper then back at crayon
MOT bends over paper and drops crayon on it
MOT picks up crayon and puts it back in box . <aft> MOT picks up another crayon and puts lid on box
CHI follows crayon with her eyes . <aft> CHI looks up at box
MOT draws a line on paper
CHI looks at crayon in her hands
CHI starts to draw on paper
<bef> MOT puts hand on paper to prevent it from sliding
CHI takes paper and lifts it up in the air with one hand
MOT places paper on lid in her lap
<bef> MOT rearranges herself . <aft> MOT starts making dots on paper
CHI starts drawing on paper in MOT's lap
CHI stops drawing and looks at crayon in MOT's hand . <aft> CHI takes crayon with left hand
CHI starts drawing still holding crayon in her left hand
CHI throws crayon on floor and takes paper
MOT leans over and picks up crayon CHI threw
CHI puts paper down on floor next to her
MOT picks up paper and puts it on lid
CHI looks at crayon in her hands
CHI looks up at MOT's hand
MOT draws a circle on paper and then lets hand rest on side of lid still holding onto crayon
CHI reaches out and takes crayon from MOT's hand
CHI bangs tip of crayon on paper
<bef> MOT puts one hand over the other . MOT picks up crayon
<bef> CHI picks up crayon and moves it a little further back . CHI starts touching the cross on floor
MOT holds hand out at CHI with the palm up
there is a crayon in MOT's open hand
<aft> CHI takes crayon from MOT's hand
CHI bends over and starts drawing on cross with crayon
MOT bends over to take crayon away from CHI then changes her mind
MOT straightens up and taps paper with finger
CHI straightens up . <aft> CHI starts banging tip of crayon on paper
CHI continues to bang crayon on paper
CHI stops banging on paper and moves crayon up in front of her
CHI looks at the two crayons in her hands
CHI puts the two crayons together and holds them between her hands
CHI holds one crayon in each hand
CHI starts banging tip of crayon on paper
MOT looks and points to something on paper
<bef> MOT holds around CHI's hand . MOT draws with CHI's hand and then lets go of it
CHI bangs tip of crayon on paper
CHI stops banging and takes paper off the lid
MOT puts arms on lid and one hand under her chin
CHI turns back to camera and puts paper on floor in front of her
CHI bangs the crayon then stops
CHI starts banging tip of crayon on paper
CHI stops banging and starts drawing on cross
CHI looks up in the direction of the wastebasket
CHI turns head and looks at lid
CHI leans over and bangs crayon down on lid letting go of it
crayon rolls off lid and lands on floor next to MOT
MOT reaches out for paper in front of CHI
MOT looks at CHI as she slides the paper closer to herself
MOT draws a small wavy line on paper then rests hand on lid
CHI watches MOT draw . <aft> CHI turns head around and looks at lid then puts hands on lid and lifts herself up so she is sitting on her knees
<aft> MOT reaches out for paper on floor
CHI turns head and looks at paper
MOT offers two crayons to CHI
CHI takes one of the crayons from MOT
CHI takes other crayon from MOT
CHI looks at crayons while kneeling beside MOT
MOT looks at CHI and nods head yes
MOT looks at crayons then at CHI
MOT points to the corresponding crayons as she says the names of the colors
CHI looks at both crayons then reaches over to the lid
<aft> CHI bangs tips of crayon on lid a few times
MOT looks at crayons then at CHI
<bef> CHI stops banging crayon on lid
CHI looks up in response to a noise outside the room
CHI bangs crayon on lid twice
CHI moves crayons closer to herself and holds them with both hands then bangs tip of one of the crayons on paper on lid
MOT looks over her shoulder then reaches for a new box on the desk
CHI looks up in direction of desk
MOT pulls box down a little to get a better view
MOT puts box back on desk
MOT starts opening box in her lap
CHI bangs tip of crayon on paper on lid once . <aft> CHI takes paper
CHI loses her balance and falls down to her left on her bottom and then stretches her hand into the box and bangs tip of crayon on side of box
CHI straightens up and stops banging
MOT moves box further away from CHI
MOT picks up crayon next to CHI and holds it up in front of CHI
<bef> CHI follows MOT's hands with eyes . CHI looks at crayon in her hand
MOT holds a crayon up in front of CHI
CHI gets up on her knees and puts hand holding crayon down in box
CHI starts to bang tip of crayon on paper in box

MOT closes hand and turns it around

MOT pulls leg a little closer to herself . <aft> MOT pulls CHI up with one hand
